div.p: This field indicates how the pharmacy dispensed the complete quantity of the prescription. When the pharmacy partially fills a prescription, this field indicates a partial fill. When the full quantity is dispensed at one time, this field is blank. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/dspnsngstuscd
This code system https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/CodeSystem-dspnsng-stus-cd defines the following codes:

tr.td: Not specified or presumably full quantity of prescription
Not specified or presumably full quantity of prescription

description.value: This field indicates how the pharmacy dispensed the complete quantity of the prescription. When the pharmacy partially fills a prescription, this field indicates a partial fill. When the full quantity is dispensed at one time, this field is blank. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/dspnsng_stus_cd

display.value: Not specified or presumably full quantity of prescription

definition.value: Not specified or presumably full quantity of prescription
